name: Roundtable
headline: Behavioral cybersecurity.
description: Roundtable uses behavioral signals to detect bots and fraudulent actors, helping platforms safeguard trust while automating fraud prevention workflows

founders.name: Mayank Agrawal, Founder
founders.description: Mayank is Co-Founder of Roundtable, which uses behavioral signals to detect bots and fraudulent actors. Before Roundtable, Mayank completed a PhD at Princeton University working at the intersection of cognitive science and artificial intelligence,  publishing in high-impact venues including Science, PNAS, and Psychological Review. Before Princeton, Mayank studied at Swarthmore College, where he also ran Cross Country and Track & Field.

founders.name: Matt Hardy, Founder
founders.description: Matt is a co-founder of Roundtable, a company using behavioral metrics for invisible fraud prevention. Before Roundtable, Matt was a PhD student at Princeton University, where he used machine learning and behavioral and experiments to study how people make decisions. Before his PhD, Matt majored in both statistics and economics at the University of Toronto, and worked in data science and econometrics.

# Invisible, frictionless cybersecurity.
## **Roundtable powers millions of secure digital interactions, stopping bots and fraud in real time—without disrupting or slowing down legitimate users.**
[ Book a demo ⌘ K ](https://roundtable.ai/<https:/book.vimcal.com/p/mayankagrawal3da79/30minutes-4d564>)
![A black checkmark in a circle.](https://roundtable.ai/images/circle-check-2.svg)

![Logo for Zinklar](https://roundtable.ai/images/zinklar-bw.svg)

PRODUCT_
## Why choose Roundtable?
#### Invisible, frictionless protection.
Seamless security with zero user disruption.
Roundtable operates silently in the background, stopping fraud without intrusive popups or CAPTCHA prompts.
[ Link 1![A black arrow facing up and to the right.](https://roundtable.ai/images/arrow-up-right.svg) ](https://roundtable.ai/<#>)
#### Real-time behavioral AI.
Stay one step ahead of bots and fraudsters.
Roundtable instantly detects bots and suspicious actors by analyzing patterns in behavior**—** before they can exploit your system.
[ Link 2![A black arrow facing up and to the right.](https://roundtable.ai/images/arrow-up-right.svg) ](https://roundtable.ai/<#>)
#### Privacy-preserving, secure by design.
No PII collected.
We protect your platform without collecting or storing sensitive user data, ensuring compliance and user trust.
[ Link 3![A black arrow facing up and to the right.](https://roundtable.ai/images/arrow-up-right.svg) ](https://roundtable.ai/<#>)
### Effortless Integration
#### Simple deployment. Instant protection.
#### Integrate Roundtable with minimal engineering effort, so you can secure your platform _fast_.
### Explainable Results
#### Transparent, Trustworthy Decisions.
#### Our models provide clear, interpretable insights, ensuring security decisions are understandable and auditable
### Enterprise-Grade
#### Built to grow with your business.
#### Whether you're securing a fast-growing startup or an enterprise with millions of users, Roundtable scales seamlessly.
CUSTOMERS_
## Securing interactions across global platforms.
## Secondary customers title
![Roundtable Directions case study image](https://roundtable.ai/images/roundtable-directions-landscape-min.png)![Roundtable Directions case study image](https://roundtable.ai/images/roundtable-directions-square-min.png)
We use Roundtable’s behavioral biometrics to examine how participants interact with the page—analyzing typing patterns, automated entries, and pasted content. These subtle patterns are often invisible to humans, but help us identify AI-generated and fraudulent responses.
Michael Herrel, Director of Data Solutions
[ Learn more ](https://roundtable.ai/<https:/www.directionsgroup.com/whitepapers/improving-market-research-data-quality-with-human-in-the-loop-ai>)
If I can spend two fewer hours looking at open-ended responses, that’s two more hours I can spend working with a client, conducting analysis, or visualizing insights. That’s value-add.
Dan Wasserman, Chief Operating Officer
[ Learn more ](https://roundtable.ai/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=sgMcABWlZzU>)
![Roundtable Obsurvant case study image](https://roundtable.ai/images/roundtable-obsurvant-landscape-min.png)![Roundtable Obsurvant case study image](https://roundtable.ai/images/roundtable-obsurvant-square-min.png)
Obsurvant and Roundtable are working to ensure that research preserves its human voice and remains a strong foundation for business decision-making. This isn’t just about detecting fraud—it’s about maintaining trust in data.
Alex Morrison, Co-founder
[ Learn more ](https://roundtable.ai/<https:/roundtable.ai/pdfs/roundtable-obsurvant.pdf>)
New forms of fraud and quality issues are constantly emerging, especially with the rise of AI-generated data. The human-in-the-loop approach ensures that detection systems stay ahead of these threats—researchers identify suspicious behavior, and our AI scales that knowledge across millions of responses.
![A man smiling in a blue shirt.](https://roundtable.ai/images/mike-herrel.jpeg)
Michael Herrel
Director of Data at The Directions Group
Roundtable creates a level of objectivity in chaos. Data quality is traditionally hard to measure. What’s been really great for us is being able to create a standardization, a common language, and a way for us to quantify data quality.
![Photo of Dan Wasserman](https://roundtable.ai/images/dan-wasserman.jpg)
Dan Wasserman
Chief Operating Officer at KJT
With Roundtable, we understand the nuance in screening questions that we would otherwise rely on our end users to make decisions on. Reducing the friction on them allows our researcher customers to move more fluently through our experience.
![Photo of Matt Bennet](https://roundtable.ai/images/matt-bennet.jpg)
Matthew Bennett
Head of Product at Respondent
Unlike traditional fraud, which often involved simple bots or low-effort responses, we are now dealing with AI-generated data that looks polished, reads naturally, and can even pass basic quality checks. By leveraging behavioral biometrics, we are able to identify AI-generated responses with unprecedented accuracy."
![A photo of a man smiling in black and white.](https://roundtable.ai/images/alex-morrison.jpeg)
Alex Morrison
Co-Founder at Obsurvant
LEARN MORE_
### Get started today
Book a demo to get started
[ Book a demo ⌘ K ](https://roundtable.ai/<https:/book.vimcal.com/p/mayankagrawal3da79/30minutes-4d564>)
![Roundtable logo with text.](https://roundtable.ai/images/logo-with-text.svg)

generated_description:
**Roundtable: Pioneering Behavioral Cybersecurity**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Roundtable is a company making waves in the field of behavioral cybersecurity. With a lean team of just two, Roundtable is taking on the monumental task of safeguarding digital interactions by detecting fraudulent activity through behavioral signals.

**The Mission**

Roundtable aims to protect platforms by identifying bots and suspicious actors in real-time, all while preserving a seamless user experience. They do this by utilizing advanced behavioral AI, which analyzes user patterns without interrupting legitimate activities with CAPTCHAs or intrusive security checks. 

**How They Operate**

Their approach focuses on “invisible, frictionless cybersecurity.” This means their system operates quietly in the background, ensuring that the only interruptions come from legitimate users. By doing so, Roundtable helps platforms maintain trust while automating the often cumbersome tasks of fraud prevention.

Key features of their product include:

- **Real-time Behavioral Detection**: Identifying bots and fraudsters by analyzing how users interact in real-time.
- **Privacy Focus**: Roundtable claims not to collect personally identifiable information (PII), which not only boosts user trust but also ensures compliance with regulations.
- **Effortless Integration**: The technology can be deployed quickly with minimal engineering effort, making it accessible for various platforms, from startups to large enterprises.

**Why Choose Roundtable?**

Roundtable distinguishes itself through its focus on explainability and transparency. Their models are designed to provide understandable and auditable security insights, which is crucial as the landscape of digital threats continues to evolve, particularly with the rise of AI-generated fraud.

The company’s leadership includes Nicolas Dessaigne as a Group Partner, exemplifying the strong mentorship backing the fledgling company.

**Who They Serve**

Roundtable caters to various industries, asserting partnerships with platforms like Obsurvant and Respondent. Their tools help these organizations ensure the integrity and quality of their data, especially amidst the challenges posed by AI advancements.

**Conclusion**

In a digital world where the stakes are high, and the threats ever-evolving, Roundtable stands out as an innovative force. By marrying behavioral signals with robust cybersecurity measures, they not only enhance safety but also contribute to an overall trusting digital environment.

For more information or to book a demo, you can visit their website at [Roundtable.ai](https://roundtable.ai).
